title: Get autofilled, Get banned xD
body:
So I'm a plat 5 jg main, one day I queue up for a game of ranked only to see I get autofilled adc, my immediate reaction was to dodge but I didn't listen to my gut, now I'm banned. I was playing jinx, level 1 my support doesn't come to lane til level 3, when she does come to lane she dies immediately so now we're fucked, mid lane isn't doing too well, so at this point enemy Fizz is decently ahead and Hecarim isn't doing too shabby, and top lane is going even, we have fiora they have malphite, noticing the team comp and noticing Fizz a little ahead, I try to safely farm at tower, team flames me for playing too safe, so I decide to group up with the team against my gut(return some flame in the process), in team fights as you can see as long as my flash is down I'll die, even if it is up I'll die, so we lose I go 2-9-3, the next day I get banned for intentional feeding, lmao. So moral of the story, if you get autofilled just dodge or you get banned for intentional feeding. Have fun on the rift :).

PS I didn't get banned I got a suspension.


Reform Card below
https://i.imgur.com/yn8reqH.jpg?1

replies.body: Post a pic of the reform card please. Is it for griefing your team or for verbal toxicity?
https://i.imgur.com/yn8reqH.jpg?1

I watched the replay and there are some issues.

Lux got there before level 3 and didn't immediately die. She also hit level 2 before you. Perhaps you are remembering a different game.

You had two big spots of extended inactivity. One for 30 seconds, which wasn't as bad since you lane was pushing and Lux went to roam. The other one was for a solid 2 minutes though. You moved a bit near your tier 2 but minions were up by the former tier 1 turret and no enemies in lane. Until Hec came in to farm the double/triple stacked wave.

Few cases of got too close and bursted and pushing without vision.

My guess would be it isn't so much a intentional feeding ban but a griefing ban (which gets the int feed label). The low cs with decent amount of afk is what may have triggered it.

Disclosure: I could be wrong about why the ban was placed, and it could be a false positive. I am only theorizing with the information I have access to.

Also the only time I remember seemingly being afk was when I was waiting for the wave to crash to the tower, as it was stacking up then lux came and cleared the wave and I didn't know what to do afterwards and I didn't want to walk up to river and die

Instead of replying to each individual reply, I'm going to address them all here.

Things that may have contributed was overly passive play at times, low creep score (result of passice play), lack of ult (again, where I watched it with quickened speed; maybe I missed it), and the lengthier afks (30 secs and 2 min ones).

When Fizz dove you after the 2 minute afk, he was 2 or 3 levels up. Only reason your team got him on a return kill was because his ult missed anf stepped in Chomper. You were still level 7 or 8 about 15 minutes in. Hec and Fizz were already at diving level/potential by then. 

Yes, you can be suspended for griefing 1 game. It isn't as common because bad games happen. This could just be a bad game case; I can only make observations on what I see and give input. 

Lux and Graves were both in the jungle when you were waiting for the big wave to crash. You could have gone up to your fallen tier 1 to get it. It was waiting for this wave that you were afk for 2 minutes (moving from entrance to jg at T2 tower, to tower, to bush, then back towards tower). Typing just means you weren't physically afk. Not contributing to the game for an extended period is afk behavior though. Depending on what you said, it could have contirbuted to the punishment. Since it is a gameplay infraction, chat logs wouldn't be included.

Again though, I am not an official representitive of Riot, so my data and ideas can be missing things.
I might be stupid, but how can you watch other people's replays? O.o

Nah, not stupid. Just a thing that was implemented at some point.

You have to be on the same server as them. Go to your profile on client and you can search for a summoner. Type in the name desired and boom. Option to check out replays
And even if, do you get suspended for griefing after one game, I've never griefed before and I'm sure I have no grief reports in my recent history or even history for that matter
also we had no vision so I didn't want to risk pushing up to feed more than I already did cause if you saw, fizz was going out of his way to kill me at times
The rioter I conversed with told me I got banned for intentional feeding, and I wasn't afk I was responding to chat and trying to avoid dying more than I already have
Submit a support ticket. Not much we can do here.
Already did and received a message that seemed automated

I looked at the game. I don't see anything intentional, unless it was coupled with chat where you said "I'm going to go feed" or something similar. While, yes, there may have been better decisions to make when playing, in terms of positioning or strategy, but playing poorly is not a punishable offense. I recommend you be patient with the ticket you have, and **be polite** with support.
I didn't get suspended for toxicity, I got suspended for intentionally feeding
https://i.imgur.com/yn8reqH.jpg?1
Time to start upvoting.

Okay ya, I call bs on riot now, it says "game 1" meaning he really was only suspended for that 1 game... -.-


Moderators need to see this thread if he is getting automated feedback -_-

> [{quoted}](name=Super Cow Swag,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=uUTi4gd2,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2018-08-25T01:50:47.640+0000)
>
> Okay ya, I call bs on riot now, it says "game 1" meaning he really was only suspended for that 1 game... -.-
> 
> 
> Moderators need to see this thread if he is getting automated feedback -_-

Moderators? Lel. They can't do anything, they don't work for Riot.
actually they do work for Riot and are required to sign Riot NDAs.

> [{quoted}](name=AirKingNeo,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=uUTi4gd2,comment-id=000700000000,timestamp=2018-08-26T01:53:55.737+0000)
>
> actually they do work for Riot and are required to sign Riot NDAs.

They do not work for Riot, they are volunteers.
Volunteers. They do not get paid.

League is getting dumb as far as behavior goes.

I called someone a "Hillary voter" and got a chat restriction.

Seriously.

I called someone a "nb3 wannabe" and said nothing remotely negative anywhere else on the chat and got a chat restriction on my main. Weird thing was whenever I signed into the client the chat logs changed between games, some of which had like 3 sentences in post game chat which were literally like "gg" "fun lane" "gl in next". Probably was a glitch but I really didn't care, climbing back up was super easy.
Okay this. This is pretty HILLARYOUS.
lmao
see above

well, that has nothing to do with league, it has to do with OSS ,  O Secret Service monitoring every transmission yet not catching so many illegal acts while crazier things happen and conspiracy runs high

lol, I watched Transformers:  Dark of the Moon today and it mentioned Obama by name and the "end of the world"  was staged from Trump Tower at the very beginning of the last presidency
Was your punishment lifted?
nah bruh
Something about this doesn't seem right, shouldn't be banned/suspended for having a bad game.

Regardless of whether or not the person was griefing, as it shows in the reform card the punishment was issued after 1 game. Really? A two-week suspension after 1 game? That's a bit much don't you think Riot?
Gameplay punishment starts at 14 day ban.

Well maybe they are more strict for adhering to reports given for ranked matches which seems counter-intuitive to me because people that lose on purpose should tank their rank quickly, it's people ruining fun of non-ranked games I would think is the most offensive but they seem to rarely ban for those? I don't really believe in reporting people in ranked because if they want to lose that's their problem. In non-ranked it's another story because you're not playing for ranks there you're playing to have fun.

Of course I used to report people in Dota 2 ranked, but that's another matter. I know they are the same genre of game but LoL has slot picking and Dota 2 doesn't. In Dota 2, toxicity is the rule, not the exception.

> [{quoted}](name=Eugene Krabz,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=uUTi4gd2,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2018-08-25T04:27:25.689+0000)
>
> Regardless of whether or not the person was griefing, as it shows in the reform card the punishment was issued after 1 game. Really? A two-week suspension after 1 game? That's a bit much don't you think Riot?

It's not. You can instantly get 14-day banned for flaming in one game.
only if you used homophobic/racial slurs
There would definitely be more to the story than what you're saying.
Lmao nice logic. You dug your own grave. Most people who get autofilled dont do that. Hence why most people have never been punished.

Got Autofilled Support...

Did horrd with an ADC who didn't know how to play game didn't go so well but managed to barely win.
what ive learnt over 3 years, dont use all chat because if people dont like it you get chat restricted for the sole reason of because they dont like u using voice chat
Last time I played Vayne in PvP I went 0/18 over 50 minutes (not on purpose, just bad), but I didn't get banned.

You say 'the team flames me' and 'the team asking me to do odd stuff' but you're not specifying which champs were saying that stuff, like was your support that was AFK at start and then died telling you or what? Because if so, I can see why others would angrily report you for heeding the calls of a potentially game-ruining player and lump you in as a suspected duo partner of that support.

You're not very good at story telling.

Happened to me 2 years ago when playing a Katarina jungle. I didn't do great but mostly my team which I suspect was a premade4 would back out of teamfights to let me die, then they'd go in. They reported me and I got a 14 day suspension for feeding. This was my first ever suspension, I was never suspended or chat restricted ever before or even to this date. I haven't played ranked since.

the only trigger i seens is there was a part where you were randomly inactive and then just sat the tower multiple times instead of going to another lane, then comeback (you also spent a decent amount of time away from team fights doing nothing)


also you didnt ult all that much if at all 

~~Fizz is a bs champ and i say he hasent been nerfed enough~~

honestly i dont think you should have been punished (although would have kept that game in mind in case of future offense)

my guess is you also said something in the chat that increased suspicion
I already got the chat restriction immediately after that game, then the next day got suspended.
If you say something like "im gonna feed or im gonna afk" even if you dont end up doing it you can get punished for it

Int bans are done after manual reviews, this means the person who reviewed his account saw enough evidence to show OP was being passive aggressive or trolling. I have hundreds of games with worse scores than OP and I'm sure I've been reported for quite a bit of them and not banned.

who knows, with millions of players, a professional streamer even got a ban overturned because it was unjustified when they had a bad game with proof

yet, they had gone I think it was 3/21 o 3/14  idk, but it was a very high number with a lot of early deaths that game and actually had a higher gold value than most of their opponents XD

I also got ADC today, intentionally. However, my only adc pick got banned so I was screwed. I didn't know what to do so I decided to go with Nidalee bot. Thinking my teammates thought it was a troll pick I expected the worst. i ended up going 14/4/7, S grade, victory AND 4 GG <3 honors. Lul. Moral of the story: supp/bot Nidalee still works.
